After what seems to take forever, her hand reaches her face. Your sister lowers her hand to her mouth, and opens wide. You are briefly mesmerize you, and you nearly miss your window to scream.

You break out of it, and scream your loudest scream you could currently muster.

Then...

choices: She goes to her room
She is going out... to meet some friends...
13.content:
What will she do when she sees you? Better not find it out!

A gigantic black sandal steps in to your room. From your point of view... you can see five beautiful toes with black nail polish on it. Your eyes goes up... you see an endless leg... a skirt... a top... and your sister´s face high above.
"Where is he?", she is mumbling to herself.
Run!
You run as fast as you could... and hope your best. She is about to turn around. You climb onto her sandal before she left your room.
13.title: Try to get to her unnoticed

choices: A visit to Julia at the farm
Lisa in the shopping hall
A quiet evening with Hanna
132.content:
You hear her on the phone with a friend she wants to meet, but you can't quite understand who is on the other end of the phone.
Usually she's with the same friend. It's either gonna be Julia, Lisa, or Hanna.

Julia is tall and blonde. She lives on a farm at the edge of town. You think she's very pretty but she's not the smartest. When she is visiting and talking to you, she always tries to be funny, but she rarely succeeds.
Lisa is a little smaller with dark hair. Her parents are very rich and you can see that. She always wears only expensive branded clothes and with her it is actually always about shopping. When she is visiting you usually don't talk to her because you think she is conceited.
Hanna is rather the nerdy friend, shy and reserved. She knows a lot and gets only the best grades in school, but her social skills with other people leave a lot to be desired.

You don't know who was on the phone, but you keep holding on to your sister's toes. Because you know alone you would have no chance to grow up again.
132.title: She is going out... to meet some friends...

choices: You hold on to your sister as tight as you can, ... and she notices
You better jump down right now and try to follow your sister with small steps
Visit the animals
1321.content:
Amy decided to take the car, thank God. You couldn't have held on any longer with all those ups and downs. Even before the car stops you notice by the smell that your sister has gone to Julia's farm.

You know that nobody can help you in the car, so you hold on as tight as you can to your sister's toe as she gets out of the car. Julia is already coming towards her on the farm to greet her friendly. When she comes running there with her half open shirt and hot pants in the sun, you realize again how hot Julia is.

You notice how both of them run towards each other more and more energetic to greet each other, soon they will fall into each other's arms again and jump around. Normally you only think that this is silly, but this time it is also dangerous.

Maybe it is better to let go now before you are thrown away. You could still follow your sister on foot, which is much safer.
Of course this can be very exhausting and you could just meet your sister again in the evening at the car to make sure you don't lose her. This would also give you the chance to make new experiences and see the farm from a whole new perspective.
1321.title: A visit to Julia at the farm

choices: Julia's shoe crashes down on you
A shock wave blows you away
13212.content:
When you jump from Amy's foot to the ground, you realize how nice it is to be able to walk on the ground by yourself again. Your hands couldn't have held on much longer either. Although it was really comfortable to rest on the bare skin of your sister's foot during the resting time in the car before.
But enough with the thoughts, you have to go after her before you lose her. Every normal step she takes is like a permanent sprint from you.
Finally you get to them both and you were right, they fall into each other's arms and jump stupidly in circles. For a moment you are happy, because you have seen exactly that before. But immediately afterwards you realize that you should have thought further.
All around you your sister with her sandals and Julia with her shoes land with loud crashes.
You are about to run away when you see the sole of Julia's shoe falling down to you from above.
Boom
He hits right next to you, the shock wave throws you to the ground, you want to get back on your feet, but you also notice how both are in the air again. Everything slows down, your body is now full of adrenaline
13212.title: not that clever

132121.content:
You just manage to stand up straight again when Amy's sandal lands next to you and you fly to the ground again. The more both of them bounce around, the more your fear of not coming out of here alive increases. In the middle of getting up you already try to run out of the danger zone again, but too late.

You see how suddenly a big shadow forms around you and a look up shows you the huge rubber sole of Julia. The shoe comes towards you faster and faster and you only realize that it is too late to run away.

Boom

All of a sudden everything goes black, no thoughts, no nothing in your life

Your entire body will be crushed immediately under the sole. All the bones break and the blood squeezes out of your body. Part of your remains will stick to the floor, part to Julia's shoe.
The two girls don't even notice the whole thing and just keep jumping up and down happily.
The little red dot on the floor, which once was you, is wiped away by the next rain

End
132121.title: Julia's shoe crashes down on you

choices: Go to the cows
Go to the chicken
13213.content:
It would be pointless just to follow your sister around all day. You let go of her foot and jump to the ground. Shortly afterwards you can actually see them fall into each other's arms and start jumping for joy. You are really happy, firstly because you were right and secondly because you don't have to be there now.

After all this time of holding on, your hands can finally relax again.

Since your sister has just arrived, she should stay a little longer, so you have time to look around.

The cowsheds would be interesting, that's where the milk comes from. Or rather the chicken coop. After all, chickens are not quite as big as bold and therefore not quite as frightening at the moment
13213.title: Visit the animals

choices: From the feed you have the best view
Just walk there slowly
132131.content:
You decide to go to the cowshed. Here the cows stand, all lined up closely together. And in front of them all a feeding trough with fresh grass in it. All devouring it greedily right in front of you.
Unless you want to end up as their next dinner, you'd better admire the spectacle from a distance. But at the back of a private compartment you notice a cow that is not eating.
Curious, you go there to take a closer look at her. You discover that this cow is a mother. Next to her in the barn a little calf is sleeping peacefully.
Somehow the whole thing is already nice to look at, so you want to look at it more closely.

Since both are not eating at the moment, it should be safe to climb into the feed directly in front of you to have a good view.
On the other hand, it is better not to risk anything unnecessarily. If you just walk up to them this should be enough in the end
132131.title: Go to the cows

1321311.content:
From feeding bowl you have a raised position to be able to look at everything. Therefore this is of course the best opiton. After a longer climbing session to get to the top, you realize how stupid you were. The mother cow is already standing in front of you. She might not have been hungry before, but she is now. You try to get down as fast as possible, but jumping is not an option at this altitude.
The stalk you are shimmying down is slowly pulled up towards the mouth of the cow. Just as you reach her teeth and can already correct her bad breath, you jump down to the next straw you can see. But the success is not granted to you for long, because this one also disappears directly in the shadow of the cow's mouth.
You are now on the Soft Tongue. Everything stinks, it is warm and damp and moves. You try to find balance as best you can to avoid the teeth of the cow. You do this quite well, but then you notice how the tongue pushes you behind in the direction of her throat.
Everything becomes dark
You get into your stomach. Everything feels squishy and your body feels strange. At first it itches, but it gets stronger and stronger and suddenly everything burns. the stomach acid starts to dissolve you and you lose consciousness. A short time later your body has completely disappeared and you are nothing more than nutrients for the cow.

At least the cow will be able to use these nutrients well, after all she has a young one to feed. Maybe the cow will be eaten by humans one day, who knows. Anyway, your story ends here.
1321311.title: How foolish

info.brief_description: You mysteriously shrink and you are stuck in the house with your sister.
info.description:
You are mysteriously shrunk after a dream that seems to weird to be real, but it seems that it is! You are now shrunk in your own house and your parents are away leaving you and your sister at the house alone.

Your sister Amy is tall at 6'3 with black hair with brown eyes. She has D cup with a chubby but nice ass. She wears black nail polish on both her fingers and toes and is not one to be bothered by you.


You were 5'6 but now you are only 1 inch tall! You are what you look like in real life. I'am not going to limit the story to what you look like. And its fun if you imagine your self in the situation any way right?


Rules: Yes there are rules. I will permit anything. I will not stress anything though. Anything is considered to be vore, anal vore, unbirthing, crushing, femdom, toilet, cock vore if a man is brought into the story, and death. You are not allowed to grow back to normal size, no links to other parts of the story when one part ends. I will allow other people to be brought into the story but they must keep the same characteristics if anything of them were written previously. No man with black hair is to have brown in the next chapther. YOU ARE ALLOWED TO BE SEEN.


The most important rule is to have fun and use your imagination to its fullest extent.

NOTE: DUE TO THE AMOUNT OF ENDINGS, PLEASE KEEP THE ENDINGS TO A MINIMUM. THANK YOU
